participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily has a passion for capturing moments through her photography. She is supportive and enjoys connecting with her students.
participant_1.background: i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i'm fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and disciplined, Jake is dedicated to helping animals in need. He has a strong sense of responsibility and values community service.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
